name: Digital Identity Concealment
description: Methods to prevent AI and surveillance systems from compiling accurate digital identities.

cards.title: Breaking AI Metadata Correlation
cards.description: How AI connects digital footprints across multiple platforms and how to break these links.
bulletpoints: Understanding metadata tracking in online communications.
Using compartmentalization techniques to prevent identity correlation.
How to maintain operational security (OPSEC) across different accounts.

cards.title: Avoiding Biometric and Facial Recognition Tracking
cards.description: Techniques to bypass AI-powered biometric identification systems.
bulletpoints: How facial recognition databases operate and how to evade them.
Using adversarial techniques to fool AI-based facial and voice recognition.
How AI extracts behavioral biometrics from typing, speech, and movement.

cards.title: Decentralized Identity and Off-Grid Digital Presence
cards.description: Building digital identities that exist outside centralized AI tracking systems.
bulletpoints: Leveraging decentralized web technologies for anonymous activity.
Using offline encryption tools to protect private communications.
How to create digital identities that are resistant to AI profiling.
